help: Sets up the player fleet for fleet testing, removing all current ships and officers and teleporting the player to Asharu.

Spawns on your location a Remnant station, which generates a specified number of fleets with a specified initial Fleet Points. Also sets relationship with Remnants to Inhospitable. By default, initial FP for spawned fleets is 128 and max number of fleets is 10.
Shows fleet stats for a specified fleet within the current location.
Shows the overall fleet composition of all fleets within the current location.
Shows all D-Mods and their distribution within the player's fleet.
Applies the maximum number of D-Mods to all ships in the player fleet. Does not include any destroyed D-Mods, like Structural Damage.
Applies specified S-Mods to all player ships matching a specified hull ID.
